Package cams.camp

Class CampEditor

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.CampEditor
public class CampEditor extends Object
The CampEditor class provides methods to edit various attributes of a camp.

Instances of this class are used to modify the editable properties of a given camp's CampInfo, such as its name, description, location, dates, and visibility. The changes made through the editor can be retrieved using the getEditedCamp method.

Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • editDates

      public void editDates(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate registrationDeadline) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Edits the registration deadline, start and end date of the camp.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the new start date for the camp
      endDate - the new end date for the camp
      registrationDeadline - the new registration deadline for the camp
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when registration deadline is after start date or start date is after end date
